body_html:
I've made a memory efficient one which mirrors the pytorch version with gradient checkpointing:
https://github.com/joeyearsley/efficient_densenet_tensorflow

Would still be nice to have a shared memory concat though for the future.

body:
I've made a memory efficient one which mirrors the pytorch version with gradient checkpointing:
https://github.com/joeyearsley/efficient_densenet_tensorflow

Would still be nice to have a shared memory concat though for the future.
